thread.section_title: Homeadvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homeadvisor | www.homeadvisor.com
thread.title: Denise K

author: Denise K
title: Denise K
text: I was thoroughly impressed THIS TIME. Truthfully, I didn't know I was using the Homeadvisor service. If I had, I likely would not have continued my search. My previous experience (again, not being familiar with Homeadvisor), left me with a negative feeling about it. This was several years ago. I was given the choice of several professionals, and chose one. After my repair was completed, I received a call from another professional on the list. When I told him the service had already been completed, he began complaining about his cost for utilizing Homeadvisor, and that he hadnâ€™t been given a chance to even give an estimate. This is the best of my recollection.
